name: Timeways
description:
Discover what sudden and absolute isolation can do to a man's conscience.

• Adventura + VisualNovel 

• Original Sound Track

• Immersive and intriguing narrative

• From the winners of the best narrative of the GJ+ 2018

• A game to make you think about life

• WASD to move and spacebar to action
